word: ya bu deveyi güdersin, ya bu diyardan gidersin

glosses: one must do what one must in order to overcome a difficult or unfamiliar situation

pronunciation: /ja bu de.ve.ji ɡy.deɾ.sin ja bu di.jaɾ.dan ɡiˈdeɾ.sin/
etymology: Morphologically ya + bu + deve (“camel”) + -yi + güt- (“to graze, to lead, to wait”) + -er + -sin + ya + bu + diyar (“country, land”) + -dan + git- (“to go, to leave”) + -er + -sin, literally “you will either graze this camel or you will leave this land”.

forms.form: ya bu deveyi gütmeli, ya bu diyardan gitmeli
